trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl" /> class is a directory control that enables the application to search the directory for objects that have changed since a previous state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl" /> 클래스는 응용 프로그램에서 이전 상태 이후 변경된 개체를 디렉터리에서 검색할 수 있도록 하는 디렉터리 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl" /> class.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl" /> class.
An opaque structure used by the server.
It is updated by the directory during each <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" />, which enables the control to incrementally read changes from the directory.
trans-unit.target: 이 구조체는 각각의 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> 중에 디렉터리에서 업데이트됩니다. 이에 따라 컨트롤에서 디렉터리의 변경 사항을 점진적으로 읽을 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.#ctor(System.Byte[])" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl" /> class using the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.#ctor(System.Byte[])" /> 생성자는 지정된 매개 변수를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: An opaque structure used by the server.
It is updated by the directory during each <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" />, which enables the control to incrementally read changes from the directory.
trans-unit.target: 이 구조체는 각각의 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> 중에 디렉터리에서 업데이트됩니다. 이에 따라 컨트롤에서 디렉터리의 변경 사항을 점진적으로 읽을 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the behavior of the search.
This parameter can be zero or a combination of one or more of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 매개 변수는 0이거나 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions" /> 값 중 하나 이상의 조합일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl" /> class using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions)" /> 생성자는 지정된 매개 변수를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: An opaque structure used by the server.
It is updated by the directory during each <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" />, which enables the control to incrementally read changes from the directory.
trans-unit.target: 이 구조체는 각각의 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest" /> 중에 디렉터리에서 업데이트됩니다. 이에 따라 컨트롤에서 디렉터리의 변경 사항을 점진적으로 읽을 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the behavior of the search.
This parameter can be zero or a combination of one or more of the values of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 매개 변수는 0이거나 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions" /> 값 중 하나 이상의 조합일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of attributes to return.
The default is 1048576.

The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions,System.Int32)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl" /> class using the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions,System.Int32)" /> 생성자는 지정된 매개 변수를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl" /> 클래스의 인스턴스를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.AttributeCount" /> property specifies the maximum number of attributes to return.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.AttributeCount" /> 속성은 반환할 최대 특성 수를 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of attributes to return.
The default value of this property is 1048576.
There was an attempt to set a value less than zero.
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.Cookie" /> property contains an opaque structure used by the server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.Cookie" /> 속성에는 서버에서 사용하는 불투명한 구조체가 포함되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An opaque structure used by the server.
This property is updated by the directory during each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest>, which enables the control to incrementally read changes from the directory.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 업데이트 하는 디렉터리에 의해 각 중 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.SearchRequest>, 컨트롤을 증분 변경 내용을 디렉터리에서 읽을 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.GetValue" /> method returns the data associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.GetValue" /> 메서드는 이 컨트롤과 연결된 데이터를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The data associated with this control.
The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirSyncRequestControl.Option" /> property specifies the behavior of the search.
The behavior of the search.
This property can be zero or a combination of one or more of the values of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 0 또는 하나 이상의 값의 조합 될 수 있습니다 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectorySynchronizationOptions>합니다.
